notes.title: Exclusion of Liked Tweets from NAND
notes.content: Liked Tweets should be excluded from the NAND system to avoid clutter and maintain the cleanliness of the knowledge base.

notes.title: Strategic Importance of NAND Vectors
notes.content: NAND file vectors are essential for both the feed algorithm and for iterating on the algorithm itself based on updated beliefs or contradictions.

notes.title: Separation of Internal and External Feeds
notes.content: Internal atomic NAND notes should be structurally separated from external social posts (Bluesky, Nostr), with the internal feed taking priority.

notes.title: MVP Storage Strategy
notes.content: Use Git for primary data storage (feed.json) and LocalStorage for client-side state (hidden posts) initially; defer decentralized protocols like NOSTR Blossom until utility is proven.

notes.title: Consolidation of Repositories
notes.content: The Note-taking and Feed repositories should be combined to streamline the workflow.

notes.title: AI's Role in Art and Creativity
notes.content: AI replaces the technical toil of art creation rather than the artist, effectively democratizing creativity and allowing human expression to explode.

notes.title: Human Value vs. AI
notes.content: Human value stems from biological, lived experience and connection; AI's role is to facilitate the expression and transmission of this organic life to others.
